lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. coaches Don Shula and Dan Reeves will coach the East-West Shrine Game at Houston’s Reliant Stadium in January, it was announced yesterday. Previously, college coaches ran each team, but organizers hoped to make it more attractive to players hoping to be drafted.
